1555521255_1ME9gwj9Exp9cBbuSxxr1mEiySEjm.body: Just a reminder: You can't upload something on ZeroNet if there's no one to download it, and in order for your site to be online there has to always be one person with the data and seeding it, ZeroNet looks a lot like BitTorrent.
